required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Meptin® Swinghaler® and Ventolin® MDI in Stable Asthma Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, randomized, cross-over, active-controlled study to evaluate the efficacy and safety effects using Meptin® Swinghaler and Ventolin® MDI in stable asthma patients.

primary_outcome.measure: The change in Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) value.

secondary_outcome.measure: The changes in IOS parameters (R, X and RF)
The change in Peak Expiratory Flow Rate (PEFR)
The change in Forced Vital Capacity (FVC)

intervention.description: Meptin® Swinghaler® Ingredient: Procaterol HCL Dosage form: 10g/puff Dose(s): 10g Dosing schedule: 20g (total 20g)
Ventolin® MDI Ingredient: Salbutamol sulfate Dosage form: 100g/puff Dose(s): 100g Dosing schedule: 200g (total 200g)
